thread.section_title: Ptr Finance Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ptr Finance Group | www.ptrfinance.com.au
thread.title: Peter and Shayne
thread.title_full: Ptr Finance Group reviewed by Peter and Shayne

author: Peter and Shayne
title: Peter and Shayne
text:
We have had the need over the past 5 years to engage the services of PTR Finance Group, and on every occasion our purchase went through quickly, all the legwork done by our consultant, all contracts emailed to us with where to sign highlighted, and no delays.
Very professional and easy to work with.
